Text.Page:
Thanks for waiting .
I've just finished inspecting the gland.

For some reason, the toxicity of the gland is far more severe compared to the ones I inspected at home. This makes me wonder...

Just how do other creatures live alongside this toxic creature?

"You got me there."

If we can figure that out, it might be a big step toward the cure.

First, I'll need stingers of the nearby eyestalkers.

I've watched the butterflies and the stinger is their most common diet. I'm certain that it'll give us a clue.

Excellent. That should be enough. Now, it's time to analyze the stingers.

Wait! Don't go. Just give me a minute. There's something else I need you to do for me.

Thanks for helping me out.
Without enough samples, I can't continue the research.
